reviews.review_msg: Sra. Tejeda is very knowledable about Spanish, including grammar, etc. HUGE amounts of homework in SPAN 103: more than I had for any 400-level course. Problem: she admits that her vocab tests are geared towards memorization of weekly words, rather than actual knowledge/learning of Spanish, but won't change them.

Ester was fantastic! Yes, the course was very assignment heavy and you had to be prepared before each class, but as a prof, she was very funny and engaging. She'll call on you to answer questions, which I found kind of nerve wracking  but it really did make me grow! I didn't expect to improve in this course as much as I did. Thanks Ester!
Sometimes she is nice and other times she is really mean. If you son't understand she make you feel bad. Exams are very difficult.

Have her as a coordinator.She is probably the worst coordinator out there. We are currently watching a movie that we have to present about,there is nothing wrong with the movie, the point is that we aren't done with the movie, and she expects us have a presentation about it... Never taking class with her again. She is useless when you email her.

I didn't have Ester as my teacher, but she was the prof who coordinated my class. She was extremely disorganized, her tests were too difficult and explanations of assignments were vague and her e-mails weren't any better. I would not recommend taking any class with her name on it. I went into the year loving Spanish classes and left it hating them.
hmmm dont get why some said "she is mean". She is pretty nice and funny lady and always want to make sure you understand. It is not a super easy course tho

I took both SPAN 102&103 wih Ester and must say that as a person who have always liked to learn Italian, I never thought I would fall in love with the Spanish language. Ester's excellent attitude and enthusiasm, and her fun-yet-serious approach proved otherwise. She does her best to make sure students have actually learned the material.
Great prof, really cares about her students and teaching them until they get it. Pay attention in class, dont slack, and try your best. She will reward you with a nice grade if you do this. Andale!

Ester is a very nice person and a good teacher, however this class is extremely difficult if you have no background in spanish. Quizes are online, which is bogus as heck, and the oral exam is only worth 10%. No curving, no partial marks and computer graded quizes is a joke for a language class. If you want people to have interest, make it human

Basically you have to learn by yourself! going to class is just to let her test you. Well, for me she is mean because as a person who know nothing about spanish, i have tried my best but how could she ask me : why others are smarter than you? WTF

Had her for both 102 and 103. One of the best profs I've encountered in university. Always willing to help as long as you try in class. Yes, the work load is heavier than expected but you learn so much. Definitely recommended.

This class was the death of me! I also took it as a GPA booster and considered myself to be a master of Spanish. You HAVE to be prepared when you come to this class, you review homework in class and if you don't speak or answer questions you will do poorly. Computer tests were very difficult and quizes every week

Be honest, she is great! But she is way too demanding. Her computer quizzes can drive you crazy at the end. But, she is a super "grade-A" teacher with a good heart unlike someone in her next door office. and you know who.... hahaha  We even had dinner with her at the end of this semester.

first of all, the class is not easy. you have to prepare before everyclass. i took this class as a gpa booster, but i got the lowest mark out of all mine. but ester is a really nice person. she cares about you and wants u to do well in the course. she brought us brownies crackers cheese cookies for the last class. best prof ever!

Ester is a great prof and extremely nice, just don't fight with her and don't try to get sympathy. She is tough and stubborn so if you want her appreciation, STUDY! This was the most fun I've had in a class ever. The entire class (22 students) was SO tight by the end and we all took Ester out to dinner. The class ain't easy though, so read the book
Not very hard but I didn't like her teaching style.  quizzes are  sometimes hard. it won't be too hard to at least get a B for the course.
very helpful if interested in the language, but also understands those who take it for because they have to
she's mean.

she expects A LOT! we have 25 students in our class and 20 of us prepare in advance for the class. she explains things clear but she is VERY PICKY. spelling marks dedcuted even if your answer is 100% correct. she talks very fast as if we should understand 100% of what she says when we've only taken a beginners class for 3 months!!

Ester is the coolest language prof around.  She explains carefully what u need to get ahead in her course and marks fairly.  she expects you to learn something and here "tareas" are not hard if you study and did well in previous spanish courses.  I LOVE ESTER TEJEDA!!!
Genuinely nice person. She is a bit demanding and the course goes fairly fast, but if you keep on top of your work and do as she says (prepare in advance), you'll have no problem.

She is a great prof. Very demanding of students but you end up learning SO much.  She may seem strict but once you get to know her, you learn that she just wants you to get the most out of her classes.  She really is a great lady, and likes to organize dinners and outings to get to know students.
Ester works very hard and cares for all of her students.  She makes sure that you need to learn something to pass her courses, even (especially) if you already speak spanish.
She is amazing!! i didn't do well in the course but Ester was so helpful! you can tell she really loves her job and wants you to do well! i highly recommend taking the class with her!!

Ester is awesome but the course is horribly difficult-this one class was twice the work load as anything else. Ester's class is kind of like a shooting gallery- you better know your stuff before class- no way to fake it. porb like all lang. crcs.
Super nice lady who cares about her students and takes the time to encourage them. I loved the class!! But she is demanding with the work load.
Really good prof. I like how she encourages class discussion rather than just doing excercises from the text. Most of the time class goes by really quickly, and is pretty fun!
She is demanding, but you will learn so much.  I love Ester!
No Comments
Excellent prof, really cares about her students and makes class fun.
A wonderful prof! Amazingly, she made learning a new language fun! Very patient and very helpful, I highly recommend this prof for those taking a language for the first time!
No Comments
No Comments
